content: अन्नमय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Consisting or made of food, composed of or containing boiled rice; °कोशः-षः the gross material body, the स्थूलशरीर, which is sustained by food and which is the fifth or last vesture or wrapper of the soul; see अन्न (2) above and also कोश; hence, also the material world, the coarsest or lowest form in which Brahma is considered as manifesting itself in the worldly existence. --यं Plenty of food.
